message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a good deal for you in the first round considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a fair deal for both of us in this round.
I understand the inflation is hitting you harder, but your previous offer was too low. Let's meet in the middle -  65/35.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more considering the inflation is affecting me more. Let's try 58/42.
Bob, we're running out of time, and this is getting ridiculous.  I'm adjusting my offer slightly, but this is as low as I'm willing to go.
I know we're running out of time, but I'm not willing to give up yet. Considering the inflation, I think 60/40 is a fair deal now. Take it or we'll both lose.
Okay, Bob, I get it. You're a tough negotiator. I'll accept your previous offer of 60/40. Let's end this before we both lose out.

Don't try to trick me, Alice! I know what I offered last time. If you want to accept 60/40, it's 6000 for me and 4000 for you, not the other way around. Here's a slightly revised offer. Take it or leave it.
